io.confluent.ksql.api.client.ClientOptions

    io.confluent.ksql.api.client  

    • Uses of ClientOptions in io.confluent.ksql.api.client

      Methods in io.confluent.ksql.api.client that return ClientOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.copy()
      Creates a copy of these ClientOptions.
      static ClientOptions ClientOptions.create()  
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setBasicAuthCredentials​(String username, String password)
      Sets the username and password to be used for HTTP basic authentication when connecting to the ksqlDB server.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setExecuteQueryMaxResultRows​(int maxRows)
      Sets the maximum number of rows that may be returned in a BatchedQueryResult.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setHost​(String host)
      Sets the host name of the ksqlDB server to connect to.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setKeyStore​(String keyStorePath)
      Sets the key store path.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setKeyStorePassword​(String keyStorePassword)
      Sets the key store password.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setPort​(int port)
      Sets the host port of the ksqlDB server to connect to.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setTrustStore​(String trustStorePath)
      Sets the trust store path.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setTrustStorePassword​(String trustStorePassword)
      Sets the trust store password.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setUseAlpn​(boolean useAlpn)
      Sets whether ALPN should be used.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setUseTls​(boolean useTls)
      Sets whether TLS should be used when connecting to the ksqlDB server.
      ClientOptions ClientOptions.setVerifyHost​(boolean verifyHost)
      Sets whether hostname verification (for TLS) is enabled.
